00003 #ifndef _ORRunDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORRunDecoder_hh_
00005 
00006 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 
00008 class ORRunDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORRunDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORRunDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual inline bool IsHeartBeat(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return dataRecord[1] & 0x8; }
00015     virtual inline bool IsRemoteControlRun(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return IsRunStart(dataRecord) && 0x4; }
00016     virtual inline bool IsQuickStartRun(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return IsRunStart(dataRecord) && 0x2; }
00017     virtual inline bool IsRunStart(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return !IsHeartBeat(dataRecord) && (dataRecord[1] & 0x1); }
00018     virtual inline bool IsRunStop(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return !IsHeartBeat(dataRecord) && !(dataRecord[1] & 0x1); }
00019     virtual inline int RunNumberOf(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return int(dataRecord[2]); }
00020     virtual inline UInt_t UtimeOf(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return dataRecord[3]; } // for run start/stop
00021     virtual inline UInt_t TimeToNextHeartBeat(UInt_t* dataRecord) { return UtimeOf(dataRecord); } // for heartbeats
00022 
00023     // for basic trees
00024     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 7; }
00025     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00026     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/);
00027 
00028     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORRunModel:Run"; }
00029 };
00030 
00031 #endif
